column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Upon entering the restaurant
column2: there were two hostesses on duty.  It was a cold night and the restaurant was not yet busy.  We opted to sit at the bar so we could watch T.V. while we enjoyed our meal.  The hostesses were friendly
column3: but did not seem overly sure of what to do. While at the bar
column4: we were greeted quickly by the bartender
column6: who offered us drinks and menus.  Carol had a glass of Chardonnay and I opted for an unsweetened Iced Tea.  Both the wine and the tea were good
column7: but the Iced Tea did not taste fresh brewed.
